title: Blood Of Kingu - Dark Star On The Right Horn Of  The Crescent Mo
description:
Blood Of Kingu - Dark Star On The Right Horn Of  The Crescent Moon mp3 320k What we got a hellof a long title .....

Blood Of Kingu was forged in 2005 by Ukrainian black metal legend Roman Sayenko (Hate Forest, Drudkh, Dark Ages), Thurios (Astrofaes, Drudkh, Hate Forest), Krechet (Drudkh, Astrofaes) and Yuri (Drudkh, Lutomysli). The debut album - entitled De Occulta Philosophia - was recorded in the summer of 2007.

It represents intensive, fast, and grim black metal with ritualistic melodies and real shamanistic, freezing voices. The main idea behind Blood Of Kingu is black metal inspired by and paying homage to Sumerian, ancient Egyptian, ancient Tibetan and Indo-Aryan mythology, demonology and astronomy.
 

Vlad - keyboards, timpani
Roman Saenko - guitars, keyboards, vocals
Roman "Thurios" Blagih - guitars
Yuriy Sinitsky - drums
Krechet - bass
